scripts.install-all: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.test:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev:test" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev:test"
